  1. Triggers
  2. INVENTORY_FULL

INVENTORY_FULL

When the player’s inventory becomes full, this trigger is hit.

Syntax

INVENTORY_FULL
  • This trigger takes no arguments.

Notes

  • Useful for various skilling and bankstanding.
